channel.title: LFS101x on Steam - a minimal theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in LFS101x on Steam - a minimal theme for Hugo

item.title: LFS101x : Introduction to Linux on edX
item.description: It was this summer when I saw this course LFS101x being offered on edX by The Linux Foundation. Both the terms Linux and edX excited me . So I decided to take this course. My experience with prior online courses I have taken few online courses on edX and coursera . In both the cases I loved the excitement and knowledge they provide. They were also fun learning and thus worked well for me.
